subject_a: Your competitors are testing pricing changes. Are you watching?
subject_b: Don't let competitor experiments catch you by surprise
plain_text:
Hi [First Name],

Quick question: When was the last time you noticed a competitor change their pricing, features, or messaging?

If you're not actively monitoring, you're missing valuable growth signals.

GrowthSignal automatically tracks your competitors and alerts you to changes that could inform your next experiment.

Recent example: We detected [Competitor] testing a new pricing tier. Our AI generated a Decision Pack suggesting a similar test could drive 15-25% revenue lift.

The entire process took 2 hours instead of 2 weeks.

Want to see what signals we're finding for your market? Check out our signal dashboard:
https://growthsignal.ai/signals?utm_source=email&utm_medium=direct&utm_campaign=signal_demo

subject_a: The growth experiment that failed (and what we learned)
subject_b: Why most growth experiments fail (and how to fix it)
plain_text:
Hi [First Name],

Last month, we helped a client test a new pricing page based on competitor signals.

The experiment failed - conversion dropped by 15%.

But here's what we learned: The competitor's change was part of a larger strategy shift, not an isolated test. Our AI missed the broader context.

We've since improved our signal analysis to capture:
• Broader market trends
• Competitor strategy patterns
• Risk assessment factors
• Success probability scoring

The result: More accurate hypotheses and better experiment outcomes.

Want to see our improved approach? Check out our methodology:
https://growthsignal.ai/methodology?utm_source=email&utm_medium=direct&utm_campaign=methodology
